ARABIC: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ شَٰمِخَٰتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَٰكُم مَّآءً فُرَاتًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Did We not place firmly embedded mountains in it, soaring high into the air, and give you sweet fresh water to drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And placed in it lofty and broad stablisers, and gave you sweet water to drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and did We not firmly fix towering mountains on it and give you sweet water to drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: place on it high mountains and provide you with fresh water?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We placed high mountains as anchors in it and gave you sweet water to drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And have placed therein fixed towers, and have given you Furat water
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And made therein lofty mountains, and given you to drink of sweet water?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Set We not therein soaring mountains? Sated you with sweetest water?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And placed therein high mountains and given you to drink sweet water therein?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have We not placed high mountains upon it and given you fresh water to drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And have placed therein firm and tall mountains and given you to drink of water fresh
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and set in it lofty [and] firm mountains, and given you agreeable water to drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And made therein mountains standing firm, lofty (in stature); and provided for you water sweet (and wholesome)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And have placed therein firm, and tall mountains; and have given you to drink sweet water?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have We not placed high mountains upon it and filled you with sweet water?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And set on it lofty mountains, and given you pure water to drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We placed therein lofty, firmly set mountains and have given you to drink sweet water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:27] and set therein soaring mountains and give you sweet water to drink?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And placed therein) in the earth (high mountains) firm mountains well-steeped in their locations (and given you) repudiators (to drink sweet water therein) and it is said fine water?
